fields.name: REFTOP_PWD
fields.description: Control bit to power-down the analog bandgap reference circuitry

fields.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF
fields.description: Control bit to disable the self-bias circuit in the analog bandgap

enumeratedValues.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF_0
enumeratedValues.description: Uses coarse bias currents for startup

enumeratedValues.name: REFTOP_SELFBIASOFF_1
enumeratedValues.description: Uses bandgap-based bias currents for best performance.

fields.name: REFTOP_VBGADJ
fields.description: Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: REFTOP_VBGUP
fields.description: Status bit that signals the analog bandgap voltage is up and stable

fields.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG
fields.description: Configure the analog behavior in stop mode. Not related to oscillator.

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_0
enumeratedValues.description: All analog except rtc powered down on stop mode assertion. XtalOsc=on, RCOsc=off;

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_1
enumeratedValues.description: Certain analog functions such as certain regulators left up. XtalOsc=on, RCOsc=off;

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_2
enumeratedValues.description: XtalOsc=off, RCOsc=on, Old BG=on, New BG=off.

enumeratedValues.name: STOP_MODE_CONFIG_3
enumeratedValues.description: XtalOsc=off, RCOsc=on, Old BG=off, New BG=on.

fields.name: DISCON_HIGH_SNVS
fields.description: This bit controls a switch from VDD_HIGH_IN to VDD_SNVS_IN.

fields.name: OSC_I
fields.description: This field determines the bias current in the 24MHz oscillator

fields.name: OSC_XTALOK
fields.description: Status bit that signals that the output of the 24-MHz crystal oscillator is stable

fields.name: OSC_XTALOK_EN
fields.description: This bit enables the detector that signals when the 24MHz crystal oscillator is stable.

fields.name: CLKGATE_CTRL
fields.description: This bit allows disabling the clock gate (always ungated) for the xtal 24MHz clock that clocks the digital logic in the analog block

enumeratedValues.name: ALLOW_AUTO_GATE
enumeratedValues.description: Allow the logic to automatically gate the clock when the XTAL is powered down.

enumeratedValues.name: NO_AUTO_GATE
enumeratedValues.description: Prevent the logic from ever gating off the clock.

fields.name: CLKGATE_DELAY
fields.description: This field specifies the delay between powering up the XTAL 24MHz clock and releasing the clock to the digital logic inside the analog block

fields.name: RTC_XTAL_SOURCE
fields.description: This field indicates which chip source is being used for the rtc clock.

fields.name: XTAL_24M_PWD
fields.description: This field powers down the 24M crystal oscillator if set true.

fields.name: VID_PLL_PREDIV
fields.description: Predivider for the source clock of the PLL's. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: RC_OSC_EN
fields.description: RC Osc. enable control.

enumeratedValues.name: RC_OSC_EN_0
enumeratedValues.description: Use XTAL OSC to source the 24MHz clock

fields.name: OSC_SEL
fields.description: Select the source for the 24MHz clock.

fields.name: LPBG_SEL
fields.description: Bandgap select. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: LPBG_TEST
fields.description: Low power bandgap test bit. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: REFTOP_IBIAS_OFF
fields.description: Low power reftop ibias disable. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: L1_PWRGATE
fields.description: L1 power gate control. Used as software override. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: L2_PWRGATE
fields.description: L2 power gate control. Used as software override. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: CPU_PWRGATE
fields.description: CPU power gate control. Used as software override. Test purpose only Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: DISPLAY_PWRGATE
fields.description: Display logic power gate control. Used as software override. Not related to oscillator.

fields.name: RCOSC_CG_OVERRIDE
fields.description: For debug purposes only

fields.name: XTALOSC_PWRUP_DELAY
fields.description: Specifies the time delay between when the 24MHz xtal is powered up until it is stable and ready to use

fields.name: XTALOSC_PWRUP_STAT
fields.description: Status of the 24MHz xtal oscillator.

fields.name: MIX_PWRGATE
fields.description: Display power gate control. Used as software mask. Set to zero to force ungated.

fields.name: GPU_PWRGATE
fields.description: GPU power gate control. Used as software mask. Set to zero to force ungated.

fields.name: RC_OSC_EN
fields.description: RC Osc. enable control.

fields.name: START
fields.description: Start/stop bit for the RC tuning calculation logic. If stopped the tuning logic is reset.

fields.name: ENABLE
fields.description: Enables the tuning logic to calculate new RC tuning values

fields.name: BYPASS
fields.description: Bypasses any calculated RC tuning value and uses the programmed register value.

fields.name: INVERT
fields.description: Invert the stepping of the calculated RC tuning value.

fields.name: RC_OSC_PROG
fields.description: RC osc. tuning values.

fields.name: HYST_PLUS
fields.description: Positive hysteresis value

fields.name: HYST_MINUS
fields.description: Negative hysteresis value

fields.name: RC_OSC_PROG_CUR
fields.description: The current tuning value in use.

fields.name: COUNT_1M_TRG
fields.description: The target count used to tune the 1MHz clock frequency

fields.name: ENABLE_1M
fields.description: Enable the 1MHz clock output. 0 - disabled; 1 - enabled.

fields.name: MUX_1M
fields.description: Mux the corrected or uncorrected 1MHz clock to the output

fields.name: CLK_1M_ERR_FL
fields.description: Flag indicates that the count_1m count wasn't reached within 1 32kHz period
